channel.title: Read me: looking for advice forum and suggested reading

item.title: Read me: looking for advice forum and suggested reading
item.author: InfoRekt
item.description:
Well, you came to the right place to ask!

This can be anything from technical to career advice. Give as much information as you can, but remember that you can't really delete stuff so be sure not to include any personal or identifiable information.

_Suggested reading_

*Pentester career info*
http://www.darkreading.com/careers-and-people/so-you-want-to-be-a-penetration-tester/d/d-id/1326163
https://www.corelan.be/index.php/2015/10/13/how-to-become-a-pentester/

*Help I got hacked!*
https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc700813.aspx
https://www.wired.com/2013/03/what-to-do-after-youve-been-hacked/

*antivirus*
https://www.av-test.org/en/antivirus/home-windows/

*antimalware*
https://www.techsupportall.com/best-free-effective-anti-malware-software/
